column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are made available on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. For those from himself or from others to him

column.name: SUBSCRIBER_NO
column.comment: A mandatory attribute that uniquely identifies the subscriber. This field is structured differently for various product types: GSM: GSM + NDC + MSISDN (without leading / trailing zeroes), Fixed Line: to be defined, Group: GRP + unique Oracle sequence

column.name: SEGMENT_IND
column.comment:
"Indicator for the segment, e.g. P for platinum.
P = platinum
G = gold
S = silver
B = bronze
R = white
T = red "
